statement:
Suppose $g \in L^2({\mathbb{R}})$ and
$g_{m,n}(x) = e^{2\pi i m x} g(x - n)$, where $m,n \in {\mathbb{Z}}$. If
$\{g_{m,n}: m, n \in {\mathbb{Z}}\}$ is an orthonormal basis for
$L^2({\mathbb{R}})$, then either
$$\int_{-\infty}^\infty x^2 |g(x)|^2\; dx = \infty \text{ or } \int_{-\infty}^\infty \xi^2|\hat{g}(\xi)|^2\; d\xi = \infty.$$
